<span class="custom-text" style="text-align: center;">Candidate Table</span>

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(htmltools)
# Read data from CSV file
file <- "analysis/OrthoFindertable.csv"
if(file.exists(file)) {
  data <- read.csv(file)
  data[, 1] <- paste0("*", data[, 1], "*")
  for (i in 1:nrow(data)) {
  # Modify the value in the sixth column
    if (data[i, 6] != ""){
      data[i, 6] <- paste0("[yes]", "(", data[i, 6], ")")
    }
    else{
      data[i, 6] <- "no"
    }
  }

  # Render the text using kable

  kable(data, align = "c", format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%  
  row_spec(1:nrow(data), extra_css = "height: 50px;") %>%
  scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "417px") 
  
} else {
  print("File not found.")
}


```
